title: new version issue can't see some character.
body: (http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hsigIZa)    (http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hsigIZa)    re- install 10 times ,but still like this, please check the link,

replies.body: Have you tried to _"initiate full repair"_? You can initiate a full repair using [this button](http://i.imgur.com/ORYPgsE.png) in the client's settings.
I tried, but still can't see some text .  anyways thank you so much.
